channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Several dumped Laughing Gas Bottles, 28th July
item.description:
These have been here for approaching a week. It's not nice to see clear evidence of drug taking on what is a common walking route to Dalmain Primary School and Seedlings Nursery.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Wastdale Road, Perry Vale, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Permanent pool of water/ flooding and silt on road, 28th July
item.description:
Permanent water (leak?) on road causing collection of green / brown silt / algae making it slippery to cross and causing damage to bikes in hangar.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Powerscroft Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Temporary Traffic lights stuck on red, 28th July
item.description:
Temporary traffic lights are stuck on red. Drivers are jumping the lights from all sides. This appears to be a massive safety issue and I fear an accident is inevitable. Aside from this. Constant gridlock traffic and horn honking causing distress and disturbance to residents.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Grange Road, Old Kent Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Furniture Dumped on Love Walk, 28th July
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 13, Love Walk, Camberwell, London
